title: Can't submit a ticket to report a summoner
body: No matter what I do, I can't submit a ticket to report someone for telling me to kill myself. It doesn't give me the option to type, it wants me to post on the forums. I reported them in-game but feel this issue needs to be reported to humans to handle.

replies.body:
If you have reported in post game then that is the best thing you can do, as it is the only way to actually put a strike against their account for the automated system to consider, manual reviews do not do this. This is why support directs you to boards, because you have already reported them, and support does not exist to discuss behaviour as boards does.

If you still wish to submit a ticket however, you will have to go the "I have a general question about League of Legends" (or something to that effect) route.
